content: BANGKOK  Oct 3 Thai motorcycle lessor Group Lease PCL has acquired a 30 percent stake in Sri Lanka's Commercial Credit and Finance PLC (CCF) for $70 million  the company said on Monday  in its first major expansion outside Southeast Asia.
name: National Retail Properties
title: Thai Group Lease to buy stake in Sri Lanka finance firm for $70 mln

content: * Craig Macnab to retire as CEO of National Retail Properties; Julian E. ("Jay") Whitehurst named as successor

title: BRIEF-National Retail Properties names Jay Whitehurst CEO  president

content: * Company issued debentures in the amount of 1.5 billion baht on 29 september 2016; interest rate of newly issued debentures is 2.84%  Source text (http://bit.ly/2d9g3Mq) Further company coverage:
name: National Retail Properties
title: BRIEF-Group Lease issues debentures for 1.5 billion baht

content: BANGKOK  Sept 7 Thai motorcycle lessor Group Lease PCL plans to buy 71.9 percent of BG Microfinance Myanmar from Sri Lanka's Commercial Credit and Finance PLC  for an unspecified amount  to take advantage of rising microfinance demand in Southeast Asia.
name: National Retail Properties
title: Thai finance firm Group Lease to buy Myanmar microfinance business

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK/BOGOTA  January 21 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed the credit  ratings for National Retail Properties  Inc. (NYSE: NNN) as follows: --Issuer Default Rating (IDR) at 'BBB+';  --$650 million unsecured revolving credit facility at 'BBB+'; --$1.7 billion senior unsecured notes at 'BBB+'; --$575 million preferred stock at 'BBB-'. The Rating Outlook is Stable. KEY RATING DRIVERS The affirmation of NNN's IDR at 'BBB+' reflects the
name: National Retail Properties
title: Fitch Affirms National Retail Properties  Inc.'s IDR at 'BBB+'; Outlook Stable
